casebody.data:
SAWYERS
v.
FARM BUREAU INSURANCE. No. 264A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2005. C. Grainger Pierce, Jr., Charlotte, for Farm Bureau Insurance. Robert S. Adden, Jr., Charlotte, for Michelle L. Sawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of June 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Farm Bureau Insurance) shall have up to and including the 18th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of June 2005."
